metadata.title: Ambassador Faisal Niaz Tirmizi, Pakistan’s Envoy to the UAE, visited the exhibition “Vanishing Points” by renowned Pakistani artist Imran Qureshi at Alserkal Avenue.

content.article_body: APP35-200425 DUBAI: April 20 - Ambassador Faisal Niaz Tirmizi, Pakistan's Envoy to the UAE, visited the exhibition "Vanishing Points" by renowned Pakistani artist Imran Qureshi at Alserkal Avenue. APP/TZD/FHA
